ResourceEnum.Name: APPMPluginReturnCode
ResourceEnum.Resource: %%Error: Can not modify an activated profile.

%%Error: Activation not allowed.vlan subprofile not configured.

%% Error: Deletion of a sub-profile is not allowed.
%%Error: Port Profile does not exist
%%Error: Port Profile is not activated
%% Error: Mac is not associated to the profile
%% Error: Fcoe sub-profile is not modifiable, as FCoE configured on some profiled ports
%% Error: Cluster Validation failed - Version Mismatch.
%% Error: port-profile is already created.
%% Error: port-profile is already deleted.
%%Error: Number of Port Profile can not exceed 256
%%Error: Port Profile creation failed
%%Error: Port Profile does not exist
%%Error: Port Profile is not inactive
%%Error: Port Profile deletion failed
%%Error: An ACL is already configured on this Profile.
%%Error: ACL config not allowed on profiled port.
%%Error: ACL attached to a activated profile.
%%Error: Commit Validation Failed.
%%Error: Vlan attached to an applied profile.
%%Error: Vlan attached to a activated profile already having an ACL applied.
%%Error: Port is Profiled, configuration not allowed.
%%Error: A CEE map is already applied to the Profile.
%%Error: A Cos-Mutation map is already applied to the Profile.
%%Error: A Cos to Tc Map is already applied to the Profile.
%%Error: Map not applied on the specified interface
%%Error: QoS is not in non-CEE Provisioning mode.
%%Error: Priority-based Flow Control (PFC) is already applied to the Profile.
%%Error: 802.3x Pause already applied to the Profile.
%%Error: Applying the map on profile failed.
%%Error: Interface has non default Qos Configuration.
%%Error: Interface is FCOE enabled.
%%Error: LAG is FCOE enabled.
%%Error: Acl is not applied on the Profile.
%%Error: Command not supported in VCS,'QoS Trust CoS' will be automatically applied if QoS CoS-Mutation map is applied on Profile
%%Error: Command not supported in VCS,'QoS Trust CoS' will be automatically removed if QoS CoS-Mutation map is removed from the profile.
%%Error: Command not supported in VCS Mode.

%%Error: Port-profile Activation Failed, reason Qos Profile Conflict
%%Error : default port-profile-domain cannot be deleted.

%%Error : switchport vlan classifications are not supported when the virtual fabric is disabled.

%%Error : port-profile is associated with an interface.
%%Error : port-profile is associated with a domain.

%%Error : port-profile-domain does not exist.

%%Error: dot1q vlan cannot have a classification.
%%Error : system has port-profile-domains which are associated with atleast an interface.
